data.name: ΔV: Rings of Saturn - Original Soundtrack
data.detailed_description: This OST was designed to blend 8 intertwining tracks according to the players situation in game. Whether you’re gliding through clusters of ice-rock at your own leisure, locating a mysterious reading on your LIDAR display, or battling it out with a pirate mining ship trying to ruin your day, the music will adapt to your situation, or even serve as a hint of what you’re about to face.
data.about_the_game: This OST was designed to blend 8 intertwining tracks according to the players situation in game.
